text: The Kidnapped Bride is a 1914 American film featuring Oliver Hardy. ==Cast== * Eva Bell - Lena Krautheimer * Raymond McKee - Emil Schweitzer * Oliver Hardy - Daniel Cassidy (as Babe Hardy) * Frank Griffin - Tango (as Frank C. Griffin) ==See also== * List of American films of 1914 * Oliver Hardy filmography ==External links== * Category:1914 films Category:1914 short films Category:American silent short films Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1914 comedy films Category:Films directed by Frank Griffin Category:American comedy films Category:Comedy short films
title: The Kidnapped Bride
